txt.en: 'You have helped us greatly already, but any one person can perform a handful of tasks. Perhaps you can assist our hunters if you truly wish to prove your courage and strength. They oft gather to the south-east. \n\n'The hunters will have much for you to do, I am certain. Hurry there, and if you return successful, then I am certain that the Elders will speak with you.'

'So you believe you can hunt, Duvodiad? We shall see. The beasts of the Dunbog are stronger, faster -- and probably stranger -- than anything you have seen before. \n\n'We do not lay traps. We hunt...with our bare hands, if necessary. Come fight with us. We shall see if you live to tell the tale.'
'You should find the hunters at their camp to the south-east.'
You continue to earn the trust of the people of the Dunbog. The Avanc-l√ªth must constantly hunt and scavenge, or they will go hungry quickly.
Talk to Harri at the hunters' camp

The hunters' camp lies to the south-east of Lhan Rhos.\n\nBain has asked you to talk to the hunters and aid them, with the hope that your success will convince the Elders of Lhan Rhos to speak with you.
